thread.section_title: MyGiftCardSupply Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of MyGiftCardSupply | mygiftcardsupply.com | 3 of 26
thread.title: Shahar Matan

author: Shahar Matan
title: Shahar Matan
text:
I bought 10$ google play gift card which didnt work for me ( Common error ) so i contacted MyGiftCardSupply costumer service, John tryied to help me as best as he can, he was nice and patient. After trying almost everything to try and solve the problem - i just couldn't redeem it.
I had the " ERROR REDEEMING CODE BM-RGCH-06" if anyone is familliar with it. Anyway, After trying to help me for hours. I asked for a refund and i got a refund from MyGiftCardSupply.
Would definitely recommend to purchase from their website ! Outstanding experience.
